Class MazeMarkovDecisionProcess

  • java.lang.Object
    • rl.MazeMarkovDecisionProcess
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MarkovDecisionProcess
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    NonDeterministicMazeMDP

    public class MazeMarkovDecisionProcess
extends java.lang.Object
implements MarkovDecisionProcess
    A markov decision process representing a maze
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Andrew Guillory gtg008g@mail.gatech.edu
